title: Step 58

challengeFiles.name: index
challengeFiles.contents: CSS Color Markers
challengeFiles.seed: CSS Color Markers

challengeFiles.name: styles

tests.text: Your .red CSS rule should have a background property set to linear-gradient(180deg, rgb(122, 74, 14) 0%, rgb(245, 62, 113) 50%, rgb(0, 0, 255) 100%).

description:
Now modify the second color argument in the linear-gradient function, which is currently pure green.

Update the rgb function so the value for red is 245, the value of green is 62, and the value of blue is 113.
